-- Loop script stolen from 0xDEADBEEF (https://v3rmillion.net/showthread.php?tid=587543) *literal legend btw
print "Clean the seas by stealing every single empty bottle!"
print "Script made really quickly by Nam#0511"
game:GetService"RunService".RenderStepped:Connect(function()
    local Event = game:GetService("Workspace").Washed.EmptyBottle.ObjectRemote
    Event:FireServer()
end)
